instruction: Preheat oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit (220 degrees Celsius).
Peel the butternut squash and cut it in half lengthwise. Scoop out the seeds and discard.
Place the squash cubes in a large bowl and toss with olive oil.
Season generously with salt and black pepper.
Spread the squash cubes in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and golden brown on the edges.
